column4: when I enable compiz under 7.10 my windows don't have a title/close/minimize/max button... how do I get it?
It could be that you need to enable window decorations
it is enabled.    an Nvidia card, restricted drivers are enabled and compiz is working.

I thought you might say Nvidia. I have heard someone else in this room with the same problem who had Nvidia and they got it worked out, sadly I did not pay attention to the conversation -- but I hope that gives you at least a starting point
